description: Users should be able to send POST, GET, DELETE requests to a web service to upload/fetch/delete/install page templates

elements.name: Page template (template_9) uploaded to a web service

steps.name: users want to upload page template
users provide page template file 'template_9.yaml'
users upload page template
page template with id 'template_9' should be successfully uploaded

elements.name: Page templates retrieved from a web service

steps.name: users want to fetch uploaded page templates
users request information on the uploaded page templates
page templates data 'template_9.json' should be successfully returned

elements.name: Page template (template_9) installed on a web service

steps.name: users want to install uploaded page template with id 'template_9'
users install uploaded page template

install operation should fail with status (400) and message 'Dependency form {\'id\': \'element-5\', \'label\': \'Element 5\', \'link\': \'http://element-5.ru\', \'depends\': \'element-0\'} is not presented in template'

arguments.val: 'Dependency form {\'id\': \'element-5\', \'label\': \'Element 5\', \'link\': \'http://element-5.ru\', \'depends\': \'element-0\'} is not presented in template'

elements.name: Page template (template_9) deleted from a web service

steps.name: users want to delete uploaded page template with id 'template_9'
users delete information on the uploaded page template
page template with id 'template_9' should be successfully deleted

name: Testing a REST API with page template-9 (non-existent parent)
description: Users should be able to send POST, GET, DELETE requests to a web service to upload/fetch/delete/install page templates
